page.title: 12GAMES
page.content: Badminton is similer to tennis but in stead of a ball you use a plastic cone which is called a{SHUTTLE COCK. Badminton is almost the same as tennis but you must hit the shuttle cock over a higher net,and it must not touch the ground. GAMES WE PLAY OUT OF SCHOOL. Some of the games we play out of school are hide and seek and tag.Hide and seek is based on the of a few people hide and one other person goes and tries to find you.The first person to be found will go on it next. Tag is where by one person has the tag,and it has to be passed on to the other players. By Nicola Stevens Joanne Smith.
